issue.title: VMWare rendering: Z Ordering Appears Random

content.raw:
I've also been testing this but couldn't reproduce the problem. ![z-ordering.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/561466375-z-ordering.png)

It could be what @nkoenig said about problem with running gazebo in a VM. Otherwise, what graphics card and driver are you using? Gazebo has been tested most on nvidia cards.
content.html:
I've also been testing this but couldn't reproduce the problem.

It could be what @nkoenig said about problem with running gazebo in a VM. Otherwise, what graphics card and driver are you using? Gazebo has been tested most on nvidia cards.
